#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType Player.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CPlayer Player]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Player (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Type used to record all information about a golfer: Identification, equipment, rounds played,
			statistics.
			A player has a mandatory gender attribute.
			The name and date-of-birth elements are mendatory as the are part of the primary key.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `gender`=golfml:Gender>
            ( uid`*`, name, date-of-birth, current-handicap?, address`*`, contact`*`, home-country-club?, note`*`, media`*`, equipment-list?, golf-bag`*`, round`*`, statistics`*`   )
  </...>
----

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| gender ||  Gender of the player || golfml:Gender || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||
